main.title: Hello, I'm Gabriel Ribeiro
content: I am 27 years old and now I work as a Front End Developer. I love web development and I always try to improve myself with each project.
In most of my current projects I use React to the frontend and NodeJS to the backend. Sometimes I use PHP.
I know about some databases, for example, Oracle, MySql and Postgres. Also, I know how to create automation flows using Jenkins.
I can adapt myself very well, so I don't have any problems to learn a new technology for a new challenge. This is very important to my professional development.

projects.title: Distrito Network
projects.specification: I work into the frontend part, creating new features for the version two, using React with NextJs.

projects.title: Notificador
projects.specification: Developed using Node in the backend and MySql database. The frontend was made using NextJs (React). The data to be sent is saved in a RabbitMQ queue and is processed by workers as requests are received.
projects.definition: System for sending information by message or email.

projects.title: Weather widget
projects.specification: Developed with react, this is a simple widget for verification the current weather forecast and the 4 days preview. You can change toggle the temperature between ºC and ºF and the language between english and portuguese.
projects.definition: A widget to check all places weather forecast.
